body: In the past few days, my php code is work! But today, I got some issue. Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'Method features not implemented' in /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/fs/libraries/whatsapi/src/whatsprot.class.php:2361 Stack trace: #0 /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/fs/libraries/whatsapi/src/whatsprot.class.php(1863): WhatsProt->processInboundDataNode(Object(ProtocolNode), true) #1 /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/fs/libraries/whatsapi/src/whatsprot.class.php(487): WhatsProt->processInboundData('\x80\x00K\xC7i\xFAt\xEB]\xF6V\xFB\x91\xB3X...', true) #2 /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/fs/libraries/whatsapi/src/whatsprot.class.php(1431): WhatsProt->pollMessage() #3 /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/fs/libraries/whatsapi/src/whatsprot.class.php(983): WhatsProt->waitForServer('message-1418368...') #4 /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/fs/form/verify/index.php(59): WhatsProt->sendMessage('{-PHONENUMBER HIDDENED-}', 'Your verificati...') #5 {main} thrown in /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/fs/libraries/whatsapi/src/whatsprot.class.php on line 2361
title: Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'Method features not implemented'
